title: Tour de France 2021 Standings after Stage 13
content:
General Classification / Yellow Jersey 

The General Classification stayed the same today after all the big contenders finished in the main peloton. Before the race, the organisation made the decision to extend the usual 3km rule to 4.5km to avoid the GC riders fighting for position on a technical run in.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Rigoberto Uran +5:18
3. Jonas Vingegaard +5:32
4. Richard Carapaz +5:32
5. Ben O'Connor +5:58
6. Wilco Kelderman +6:16
7. Alexey Lutsenko +6:30
8. Enric Mas +7:11
9. Guillaume Martin +9:29
10. Pello Bibao +10:28

Tour de France 2021 Guide

Points Classification / Green Jersey

Mark Cavendish still leads the points classification for Deceuninck Quick-Step. He took a 34th stage win today, equalling Eddy Merckx's record. 

1. Mark Cavendish - 279 points
2. Michael Matthews - 178 points
3. Jasper Philipsen - 171 points
4. Sonny Colbrelli - 151 points
5. Julian Alaphilippe - 131 points

The Tour de France jerseys – the race so far

King of the Mountains Classification / Polka-Dot Jersey

Quintana retained his lead in the KOM Classification.

1. Nairo Quintana - 50 points
2. Wout van Aert - 43 points
3. Michael Woods - 42 points
4. Wout Poels - 39 points
5. Bauke Mollema - 36 points

Young Rider's Classification / White Jersey

The Young Rider's Classification stayed the same today after a bunch finish.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Jonas Vingegaard +5:32
3. Aurélien Paret-Peintre +24:44
4. David Gaudu +30:51
5. Valentin Madouas +01:24:57

Team Classification

1. Bahrain Victorious
2. AG2R Citroën +10:01
3. EF Education Nippo +15:47
4. Ineos Grenadiers +17:27
5. Bora Hansgrohe +29:31
